column5: My residence is centrally located. It is 5-10mins from major malls, shopping, fine dining, and night entertainment. Right off George Bush Highway and near Dallas Tollway & 35. This residence is great for a person in the airline industry, because it gives you quiet & comfortable living while being 20mins from DFW airport and 15mins from Dallas Love Field airport. The second bedroom is for you the guest only. A Person in the traveling/airline industry preferred. Quiet with no traffic.
column8: Quiet location for traveling industry individual
